message: Ever hear anyone call out """"in the name of evolution"""" before shooting up people? NOPE always in the name of one of the many religions. Religion is man's deadliest invention, used to control the masses for centuries. Almost 5000 gods to choose from, what makes yours the """"right one"""" If religion were real there would be only one, and there would be some kind of evidence of it's existence. Easier to live the lie I suppose.

The lack of intelligent thought is scary. Whoever referred to Obama as a Muslim, stop drinking or smoking whatever it is that's fogging your brain cells. Then go seek mental help, because you greatly need it. SMH! Yes, both parties share part of the blame. No, nobody is perfect. Yes immigration is an issue, but it has been an issue for YEARS. And we are a land of immigrants. A path to citizenship is the logical, moral and cost effective thing to do. I'm not entirely sure what the best way to do that is, but people need to come to the table to have a rational discussion about it. It is ridiculous to think we could simply deport the HUGE number of immigrants who have made America home. The cost would be immense, and it would cause many more issues beyond those people's lives. You are not being realistic. Implement a path to citizenship and then make better policies for moving forward. Why are some of you so hateful? Do you really think illegal immigrants are what's hurting your lives? I feel sorry for you. Have a little compassion. All these people want is to be a contributing member of society and have a better life.

Life without God is like unsharpened Pencil- It has no pint and no use! There is no any good role model for kids in western countries. You all are the same. You forgot how your forefathers lived. They were God fearing nation. They at least tried their best to lived according the word of God. They were missionaries of God all most all over the world. But now in the name humanity and equality, you started ignoring that right way of your forefathers; the mystery of you being super power in politics and economically. You turned your back on God and messing with him; which is so wrong! That is the fact! Now you have got two options; Get back to where you used to be and keep being blessed in everything you need OR perish from the face of the earth!
